steps.name: I click "kablosuz kulaklık" to open its details page
Verify product name, price, and availability status are displayed correctly
I add the selected product to the cart
Verify the product appears in the cart with the correct details
Verify the cart total is accurate
I add 1 more product to the cart
Verify the cart total is accurate
I remove 1 product from the cart
Verify the cart total is accurate
I remove the item from the cart
Verify the product is no longer listed in the cart

name: Trendyol website - product search, add to cart, and remove from cart
